overview: Sheldon is barely able to contain the anger and bitterness that has come to define his life when a visit to his father's house triggers an eruption of emotions that he cannot control. Confronted with his past, and the memory of his deceased mother, Sheldon must reconcile his own sense of loss with his father's ability to move on. When he resorts to spying on his father, Sheldon is forced decide if he can become the man his family needs before it's too late.
title: Driving Home
